channel.title: Papers with Code: Latest (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: Using eye tracking to investigate what native Chinese speakers notice about linguistic landscape images
item.description: This paper uses eye tracking technology to study the actual fixation of the linguistic landscape and finds that in the two dimensions of fixation time and fixation times, the fixation of native Chinese speakers to the linguistic landscape is higher than that of the general landscape.

item.title: Revisiting Depth Completion from a Stereo Matching Perspective for Cross-domain Generalization
item.description: This paper proposes a new framework for depth completion robust against domain-shifting issues.

item.title: OccNeRF: Self-Supervised Multi-Camera Occupancy Prediction with Neural Radiance Fields
item.description: Moreover, for semantic occupancy prediction, we design several strategies to polish the prompts and filter the outputs of a pretrained open-vocabulary 2D segmentation model.

item.title: Agent Attention: On the Integration of Softmax and Linear Attention
item.description: Specifically, the Agent Attention, denoted as a quadruple $(Q, A, K, V)$, introduces an additional set of agent tokens $A$ into the conventional attention module.

item.title: Knowledge-Driven Modulation of Neural Networks with Attention Mechanism for Next Activity Prediction
item.description: Predictive Process Monitoring (PPM) aims at leveraging historic process execution data to predict how ongoing executions will continue up to their completion.

item.title: VL-GPT: A Generative Pre-trained Transformer for Vision and Language Understanding and Generation
item.description: In combination with the existing text tokenizer and detokenizer, this framework allows for the encoding of interleaved image-text data into a multimodal sequence, which can subsequently be fed into the transformer model.

item.title: Single and Multi-Objective Benchmark Problems Focusing on Human-Powered Aircraft Design
item.description: This paper introduces a novel set of benchmark problems aimed at advancing research in both single and multi-objective optimization, with a specific focus on the design of human-powered aircraft (HPA).

item.title: CLIP-guided Federated Learning on Heterogeneous and Long-Tailed Data
item.description: For server-side learning, in order to mitigate the heterogeneity and class-distribution imbalance, we generate federated features to retrain the server model.

item.title: Dataset Distillation via Adversarial Prediction Matching
item.description: This ensures the memory efficiency of our method and provides a flexible tradeoff between time and memory budgets, allowing us to distil ImageNet-1K using a minimum of only 6. 5GB of GPU memory.

item.title: Privacy Amplification by Iteration for ADMM with (Strongly) Convex Objective Functions
item.description: Our main result is that the privacy guarantee for the gradient ADMM variant can be amplified proportionally to the number of iterations.

item.title: VSFormer: Visual-Spatial Fusion Transformer for Correspondence Pruning
item.description: Correspondence pruning aims to find correct matches (inliers) from an initial set of putative correspondences, which is a fundamental task for many applications.

item.title: Incomplete Contrastive Multi-View Clustering with High-Confidence Guiding
item.description: In this work, we proposed a novel Incomplete Contrastive Multi-View Clustering method with high-confidence guiding (ICMVC).

item.title: PANDA: Architecture-Level Power Evaluation by Unifying Analytical and Machine Learning Solutions
item.description: Based on the formulation, we propose PANDA, an innovative architecture-level solution that combines the advantages of analytical and ML power models.

item.title: Detection and Defense of Unlearnable Examples
item.description: Detectability of unlearnable examples with simple networks motivates us to design a novel defense method.

item.title: Towards Robust and Expressive Whole-body Human Pose and Shape Estimation
item.description: Whole-body pose and shape estimation aims to jointly predict different behaviors (e. g., pose, hand gesture, facial expression) of the entire human body from a monocular image.

item.title: Global Rewards in Multi-Agent Deep Reinforcement Learning for Autonomous Mobility on Demand Systems
item.description: We study vehicle dispatching in autonomous mobility on demand (AMoD) systems, where a central operator assigns vehicles to customer requests or rejects these with the aim of maximizing its total profit.

item.title: Progressive Uncertain Feature Self-reinforcement for Weakly Supervised Semantic Segmentation
item.description: Building upon this, we introduce a complementary self-enhancement method that constrains the semantic consistency between these confident regions and an augmented image with the same class labels.

item.title: EAT: Towards Long-Tailed Out-of-Distribution Detection
item.description: The main difficulty lies in distinguishing OOD data from samples belonging to the tail classes, as the ability of a classifier to detect OOD instances is not strongly correlated with its accuracy on the in-distribution classes.

item.title: Detecting value-expressive text posts in Russian social media
item.description: We aimed to find a model that can accurately detect value-expressive posts in Russian social media VKontakte.

item.title: CattleEyeView: A Multi-task Top-down View Cattle Dataset for Smarter Precision Livestock Farming
item.description: Cattle farming is one of the important and profitable agricultural industries.

item.title: BiPFT: Binary Pre-trained Foundation Transformer with Low-rank Estimation of Binarization Residual Polynomials
item.description: Specifically, we first analyze the binarization error in self-attention operations and derive the polynomials of binarization error.

item.title: MaxK-GNN: Towards Theoretical Speed Limits for Accelerating Graph Neural Networks Training
item.description: In this paper, we present MaxK-GNN, an advanced high-performance GPU training system integrating algorithm and system innovation.

item.title: Modeling Complex Mathematical Reasoning via Large Language Model based MathAgent
item.description: Large language models (LLMs) face challenges in solving complex mathematical problems that require comprehensive capacities to parse the statements, associate domain knowledge, perform compound logical reasoning, and integrate the intermediate rationales.

item.title: Learning from Polar Representation: An Extreme-Adaptive Model for Long-Term Time Series Forecasting
item.description: In the hydrology field, time series forecasting is crucial for efficient water resource management, improving flood and drought control and increasing the safety and quality of life for the general population.

item.title: WIT-UAS: A Wildland-fire Infrared Thermal Dataset to Detect Crew Assets From Aerial Views
item.description: We present the Wildland-fire Infrared Thermal (WIT-UAS) dataset for long-wave infrared sensing of crew and vehicle assets amidst prescribed wildland fire environments.

item.title: CT-MVSNet: Efficient Multi-View Stereo with Cross-scale Transformer
item.description: Recent deep multi-view stereo (MVS) methods have widely incorporated transformers into cascade network for high-resolution depth estimation, achieving impressive results.

item.title: Learning a Low-Rank Feature Representation: Achieving Better Trade-Off between Stability and Plasticity in Continual Learning
item.description: This approach optimizes network parameters in the null space of the past tasks' feature representation matrix to guarantee the stability.

item.title: UCMCTrack: Multi-Object Tracking with Uniform Camera Motion Compensation
item.description: In response to this, we introduce UCMCTrack, a novel motion model-based tracker robust to camera movements.

item.title: Local Conditional Controlling for Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
item.description: In this paper, we introduce a new simple yet practical task setting: local control.

item.title: Generative Model-based Feature Knowledge Distillation for Action Recognition
item.description: Addressing this gap, our paper introduces an innovative knowledge distillation framework, with the generative model for training a lightweight student model.

item.title: Gradient Informed Proximal Policy Optimization
item.description: We introduce a novel policy learning method that integrates analytical gradients from differentiable environments with the Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) algorithm.

item.title: DriveMLM: Aligning Multi-Modal Large Language Models with Behavioral Planning States for Autonomous Driving
item.description: In this work, we delve into the potential of large language models (LLMs) in autonomous driving (AD).

item.title: SpectralNeRF: Physically Based Spectral Rendering with Neural Radiance Field
item.description: We modify the classical spectral rendering into two main steps, 1) the generation of a series of spectrum maps spanning different wavelengths, 2) the combination of these spectrum maps for the RGB output.

item.title: Fair Clustering: A Causal Perspective
item.description: Our approach enables the specification of the causal fairness metrics that should be minimised.

item.title: Achelous++: Power-Oriented Water-Surface Panoptic Perception Framework on Edge Devices based on Vision-Radar Fusion and Pruning of Heterogeneous Modalities
item.description: Urban water-surface robust perception serves as the foundation for intelligent monitoring of aquatic environments and the autonomous navigation and operation of unmanned vessels, especially in the context of waterway safety.

item.title: Graph Neural Networks with Diverse Spectral Filtering
item.description: Spectral Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) have achieved tremendous success in graph machine learning, with polynomial filters applied for graph convolutions, where all nodes share the identical filter weights to mine their local contexts.

item.title: A Picture is Worth More Than 77 Text Tokens: Evaluating CLIP-Style Models on Dense Captions
item.description: Curation methods for massive vision-language datasets trade off between dataset size and quality.

item.title: An Incremental Unified Framework for Small Defect Inspection
item.description: Artificial Intelligence (AI)-driven defect inspection is pivotal in industrial manufacturing.

item.title: CogAgent: A Visual Language Model for GUI Agents
item.description: People are spending an enormous amount of time on digital devices through graphical user interfaces (GUIs), e. g., computer or smartphone screens.

item.title: Coevolutionary Algorithm for Building Robust Decision Trees under Minimax Regret
item.description: It outperformed all competing methods on 13 datasets with adversarial accuracy metrics, and on all 20 considered datasets with minimax regret.

item.title: YOLO-OB: An improved anchor-free real-time multiscale colon polyp detector in colonoscopy
item.description: These problems reduce the performance of polyp detection and also lower the model's training and detection efficiency.

item.title: Tokenize Anything via Prompting
item.description: The semantic token is responsible for learning the semantic priors in a predefined concept space.

item.title: ColNeRF: Collaboration for Generalizable Sparse Input Neural Radiance Field
item.description: Through this, we construct a novel collaborative module that aligns information from various views and meanwhile imposes self-supervised constraints to ensure multi-view consistency in both geometry and appearance.

item.title: DiffusionLight: Light Probes for Free by Painting a Chrome Ball
item.description: To address this problem, we leverage diffusion models trained on billions of standard images to render a chrome ball into the input image.

item.title: Unbiased organism-agnostic and highly sensitive signal peptide predictor with deep protein language model
item.description: Signal peptide (SP) is a short peptide located in the N-terminus of proteins.

item.title: Factorization Vision Transformer: Modeling Long Range Dependency with Local Window Cost
item.description: Accordingly, we propose a novel factorization self-attention mechanism (FaSA) that enjoys both the advantages of local window cost and long-range dependency modeling capability.

item.title: Zoom in on the Plant: Fine-grained Analysis of Leaf, Stem and Vein Instances
item.description: Robot perception is far from what humans are capable of.

item.title: KDAS3: Knowledge distillation via Attention Supervision, and Symmetrical structure guiding for Polyp Segmentation
item.description: This framework is designed to facilitate knowledge transfer from a teacher model to a more compact student model with fewer parameters.

item.title: Mono3DVG: 3D Visual Grounding in Monocular Images
item.description: To foster this task, we propose Mono3DVG-TR, an end-to-end transformer-based network, which takes advantage of both the appearance and geometry information in text embeddings for multi-modal learning and 3D object localization.

item.title: CoRTEx: Contrastive Learning for Representing Terms via Explanations with Applications on Constructing Biomedical Knowledge Graphs
item.description: Due to a lack of knowledge, previous contrastive learning models trained with Unified Medical Language System (UMLS) synonyms struggle at clustering difficult terms and do not generalize well beyond UMLS terms.
